Abstrak:
Megha Bhatt grew up gazing at the Moon riding through the blackest of skies.
Electricity was often off at night in her small village in India, so there was plenty of
time to marvel at the celestial views. Her parents told her stories of how American men had gone to the Moon and taken a giant step there. At school, she saw a video of Neil Armstrong on the lunar surface, and she was hooked. She became a planetary scientist.
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
